title: 5th Sem Electives for Computer Science
content: I am totally confused about what to choose for Electives 1 and 2. I just want to select subjects that are scoring. Can you suggest which subjects are good for scoring marks? I want to increase my CGPA.

comments.body:
Ac for first elective is probably one of the easiest.not too sure for second 

And if you're aiml, take whichever elective a guy called doreswamy takes. The average isa marks are like 38/40
i am from cse which one is the marks scoring i want to take that pls tell me
I just told you are you dislexyc
